name: Deadline (itch) (GeorgeVDR)
description:
This is our first game jam and so we went meta - a game about making games while playing games, which also makes a game... what a rush, but the deadline got us before we could finish our very satisfying and self-referential conclusion!

WASD moves you, pick up powerups to advance your game progress bar before the deadline, writer's block and fatigue monsters slow you down! Click your mouse button to submit your game when the progress bar is full, and await judgement. 

Categories eligible for:

Hobbyist
Best Art
Best Physics
Technical Excellence
Best Narrative

72 hour submission, programmed in Godot

All coding by Donnie Conradie
All art made for this jam by George van der Riet
SFX and music from, Zapsplat, and our own coffee drinking foley
